name: The Block Pro
title: December24 Markets Recap
text:
Synopsis
Crypto market volumes decreased in December, with Bitcoin and Ethereum experiencing reduced on-chain activity, while upcoming economic indicators could provide insights into market conditions.

Key Insights
- Total adjusted on-chain volume decreased by 5.9% to $670 billion in December
- Bitcoin's on-chain volume dropped 5.4% to $450 billion
- Ethereum's on-chain volume declined 6.9% to $220 billion
- Upcoming key economic events include:
  - Jan 6: S&P final U.S. services PMI, Factory orders
  - Jan 7: U.S. trade deficit, ISM services, Job openings
  - Jan 8: S&P Case-Shiller home price index, ADP employment, Consumer credit
  - Jan 10: U.S. employment report, unemployment rate, hourly wages
- Potential regulatory development: MiCA (European Union's attempt at unified crypto regulation)
